interpretation:
The Flag of Angola represents the courage and determination of the nation’s people. It symbolizes the strength and resilience of the country and its ability to overcome challenges. This card encourages you to stay strong and persevere in the face of adversity. You have the power within you to overcome any obstacle, and this flag reminds you of your own inner strength.

The colors of the flag - red, black, and yellow - represent the bloodshed during Angola’s fight for independence, the people of Angola, and the country's natural resources respectively. This card also represents unity, reminding you that by coming together with others, you can achieve great things. It’s time to focus on the common goal and work together to achieve it.

In readings, this card suggests that you have what it takes to overcome challenges and obstacles. You may be faced with difficult situations or decisions, but this card reminds you to stay strong and persevere. You may need to call upon your inner strength and resilience to overcome these challenges, but you have the power within you to succeed. Focus on working together with others to achieve your goals, and you will find success.
